design_philosophy.core_concept: Digital Democracy meets Ancient Heritage. A fusion of brutalist political typography with the organic textures of Nepal.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Modern Nepalese. High contrast, paper textures, bold symbols.
design_philosophy.light_dark_mode: Hybrid. Light Mode (Rice Paper) for history/reading. Dark Mode (Night Count) for live results.

headings.usage: All main page titles, candidate names, and 'VOTE NOW' CTAs.

narrative.usage: The 'Mission Statement' and historical context sections.

primary.name: Gorkhali Red
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, Nepal flag elements.

background.paper_texture: Use a subtle noise overlay on the light background.

landing_page.hero_section: Full-screen background image (Kathmandu Historic) with 'Mission Statement' overlay in Playfair Display.
landing_page.mission_statement: Scroll-triggered storytelling. Text fades in over historical images.

voting_page.card_style: Minimalist. White background, 1px border (Peace Blue). Large Party Symbol centered. Candidate name at bottom in Bebas Neue.
voting_page.interaction: Card scales up 1.05x on hover. Border turns Gorkhali Red on selection.

results_dashboard.density: High. Use 'Peace Blue' background for the dashboard container to make white charts pop.
results_dashboard.charts: Use Recharts. Bar charts for party seats, Pie charts for vote share.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D90429] text-white hover:bg-[#EF233C] rounded-none uppercase font-bebas tracking-wider px-8 py-3
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-[#003049] text-[#003049] hover:bg-[#003049] hover:text-white rounded-none uppercase font-bebas tracking-wider px-8 py-3

cards.candidate: bg-white border border-gray-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm p-6 flex flex-col items-center text-center

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-gray-300 focus:border-[#D90429] outline-none rounded-none px-0 py-2 transition-colors

icons.party_symbols: Use Lucide icons as metaphors if real SVGs aren't available: 'Sun' (UML), 'TreeDeciduous' (Congress), 'Bell' (RSP), 'Hammer' (Maoist - use 'Gavel' or custom SVG).

motion.page_transition: Slide in from right (X-axis) for voting flow. Fade in for history.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or noise textures.
Ensure all text on the Hero image has a 'backdrop-blur-sm' or dark overlay for readability.
Use 'Bebas Neue' ONLY for headings. It is too hard to read for body text.
The 'Mission Statement' is the heart of the app. Make it poetic and visually distinct.
For the 'Anonymous Voting' feature, emphasize privacy visually (e.g., 'Incognito' icons, lock symbols).
instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure Tailwind theme to include the custom colors (Gorkhali Red, Peace Blue, etc.).
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Navbar (with Nepal Flag logo) and Footer.
4. Build the 'CandidateCard' component first - it's the core of the voting page.
5. Use the provided image URLs for the Landing Page hero section.
6. For the 'Mission Statement', create a text-heavy section with the 'Playfair Display' font.
